title: Welcome to Alleogry
excerpt: Allegory will document my journey from a bootstrapped dorm room operation to a fully functioning hedge fund.
body:
This is my first full entry here on Allegory, and while I expect the writing to sharpen over time, you have to start somewhere. So here it is.
Allegory will document my journey from a bootstrapped dorm room operation to a fully functioning hedge fund. I currently have roughly $2,100 in my brokerage account. Between my part-time internship and the future revenues of this site, I intend to grow that number and bring you along for the ride.

**The Problem**
I am currently building a set of tools that I will be releasing here shortly. The first one was born out of frustration.
I would set screening parameters on ThinkorSwim, and thousands of tickers would flood the screen  prices, volumes, percent changes, the works. The first time I decided to take a deep dive on one of those names, I got lucky. After hours of reading through tickers, pulling up company websites, earnings releases, and other filings, I landed on a company with a compelling story. It was in the middle of a turnaround, and by the end of my analysis I felt confident it was a good buy.
The problem was the process. I had no way of knowing whether I would get that luck again, or if I would waste two hours scanning tickers and then spend days digging into a single name with nothing to show for it.

**The Solution**
I built something better. I wrote a Python program that scans all 7,000+ microcap stocks listed on the NYSE and NASDAQ. The program evaluates each company on a quantitative basis to determine whether it warrants further analysis. It first applies a set of automatic disqualifiers to clear out the obvious noise, then uses metrics like revenue trends, FCF yield, ROIC, ROE, and P/B ratio (among others) to rank the remaining universe and surface the top 50.

**What You Can Expect**
My goal is straightforward. I will further filter that top 50 and publish the top 10 here on the site as a resource for you. Once my next project is complete, I will begin posting full analyst-level research on the top 5 companies. Both lists will be updated monthly.
Most microcap stocks receive zero coverage from major banks. I am building Allegory to be a resource for retail investors who do their own work and for smaller funds whose position sizing allows them to operate in the microcap space.
That is what I am working on now. I will keep uploading information and stress testing my models. The more work I put in, the more I learn, and the more I can provide for you. I look forward to building this, and I hope it earns your attention.
